comment: He definitely makes you WORK but I can appreaciate everything I learned in his class. He expects the best from his students so that we Can excel in the real world. I wish all of my professors cared about my future like he did.

This course was taken during my freshman year. I have to admit, this course was one that I will never forget for several reasons. Primarily, never had I teacher accept nothing less than excellence from his students. Indeed his standards were high, and for some classmates overwhelmingly so, however this class taught me how to write well.
This class wasn't easy for me but I worked harder and he helped where he could. Great person but he doesn't take easy on you. He believes everyone has the ability to pass but you have to want it.
Make sure you study and turn in your homework!! Pr. Capers will be there for you. He is the best person I have ever got

comment: 4 papers, tells you exactly what he wants over and over so there is no miscommunication. Grades respectfully. Always willing to help students achieve an A. Quizzes are easy if you do what he says. Listen to what he says, lowest grade you will make is a B.

I am not sure why Professor Capers has all this negativity toward him. Mr. Capers was by far the funniest and most qualified professor I ever had. He knew his stuff and he made sure everyone else knew it. if you approach his class, pants sagging, late, and disrespectfully, of course he can be an a hole just like the rest of him.
